title: Had my worst experience in league today
body:
I load into the last game of my promos. My mid laner is hovering Yasuo and our jg bans it. An argument in chat happens over this and to be honest I did not read it. If it was not my last promo I would have dodged. 

The yi as soon the game starts says your welcome for the - lp. He stands dead center mid feeds a kill, runs back does it again, The support fiddle took his blue because yi is trolling. Made things even worse as then yi came bot and fed two kills. Yi goes top and does the same thing.   Yi made clear decisions and threw fights on purpose for the sole reason that he could. He was just another smurf that ruined another game. 

What really ruined the whole game for me was the enemy mid laner. As soon as it was five minutes in the guy starts begging in all chat for us to open and just ff.  Says he deserved the win the yi was giving them since he was trolled a game earlier.  I was disgusted the guy was more focused on trying to get us to just stop playing rather than just play.  It was not a competitive game of league of legends it was a joke. The vel was not playing to get better or playing to win. The vel was more toxic than the yi as he afkd and all chatted he was going to make lunch. he did.   In post-game chat, he harassed and bragged about the win. 

If yi even played seriously for five minutes we would have won the game. I am tired of having my time wasted and ruined by one person. 
Solo/duo is supposed to be the competitive mode of league but it is more of a gamble than anything.  I will happily lose any game where my whole team tried.  Whereas I'm sick and tired of one person ruining the whole gameplay experience because they think they're more important.

I am done being harassed and tormented by my own teammates. I was cheated out of a promo game today and there is nothing that will be done. I am being cheated out of games. My time is being wasted. I have no impact in the game when a single feeder makes it impossible to win.  I want change, I want to be able to play a game of league that is not going to be sabotaged by people that are supposed to help me win. 

It is not the lack of balance and the overloaded damage that ruins league for people but the players and the lack of care from riot. 

When everyone treats it like a joke, laughs at it like a joke, thinks it a joke, It is a joke.   Ranked in a nutshell this season.



4/26 update. 

Had three people rage quit today three different games happening too much for ranked to be fair.

4/27 update
First game of the day a guy locks in thresh top and the support goes kogmaw and says I'm tired of trolls and doesnt do anything but sit in jg and refuses to play.

replies.body:
You can mute people. You can filter bad words.

What more do you want?
Teammates that do no actively ruin the game on purpose. Opponents that would rather play a real match than have no honor.

> [{quoted}](name=Boo Koo God,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZiBBzwQn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-04-25T21:17:28.651+0000)
>
> Teammates that do no actively ruin the game on purpose. Opponents that would rather play a real match than have no honor.

Pretty much this. Communication is key, and muting everyone is literally condemning yourself to a lack of map awareness and important queues. People should not be insulted because they are playing a competitive game -- the anonymity on the Internet is what enables it, and such anonymity is not simply going to be removed. So there must be according punishments to people who are just flat-out dicks. No one should have to change the way they play just to avoid other people -- it's a TEAM game and a TEAM, must stick together, even if it's only for a game or grudging through a hard game.

Impossible.

Have you thought of playing a 1v1 game?  I've found they drastically decrease the amount of people you have to deal with.

I won a game to day because of trolls. And I've won many a promo because of trolls, afks and feeding shitheads. I don't see the problem here. You can't stop people from being assholes but at least you will win as many games and you'd lose because of them.

The problem is not being trolled and losing games or facing trolls and winning them. The problem is overall these issues ruing player experience and gameplay.  I'm a veteran of this game and not in shock of the trolls. As a veteran, it is just getting worse and not getting any better.
How selfish can you be? It's not a problem because it happens to your enemies?

You cannot fix this. If it were possible to fix this then we'd also have a 100% crime free world with no wars and everyone would be peace loving free love hippies. These thing have human nature at their core, something we cannot and should not try to change. You put a bunch of people together and force them to interact and you will get a shit storm eventually. Video games and other online communities are no different. Our nature doesn't just vanish the moment we go online, we take it with us.

So rather than complain and make these useless threads over and over and over again, it's better to trying and work with it the way most of us have to deal with the shit reality that is daily life. Realizing that you stand to win just as much as you'd stand to lose is a step in the right direction.

It took me years to realize this and I even used it to my advantage and actually got an account to Gold for the first time this season by taking advantage of this phenomenon.

Look, you can either come here and cry till you're blue in the face about feeders, trolls and afks or you could accept the reality and try to work with it. But if you'd rather waste the time bitching and complaining, then go right ahead. Don't let me stop you.

Don't use excuses like "human nature" and "shit reality" to justify your shitty attitude. The key difference between humans and animals is that we can willfully defy our nature. Get your head on straight.
Well feel free to cry on the boards all day then, because that will surely help.....right?

Just remember. He won’t be punished for it either. Because riot doesn’t actually punish anyone. Unless you point out to someone who is inting that they are inting. Then you get mutes. :D

Apparently calling someone a griefer or trolling is punishable though.  You can't point out that a player legitimately said they're running it down mid now or "have fun with the loss", or else you're the one that gets bans.. while that player gets away scott free every time, no matter what they admit to.

Most amazing rito logic

you don't need to point it out. one report is all it takes for that game to be checked and used as a piece of evidence for determining a ban.
actively interacting in the scenario in any way is unnecessary. just keep your mouth closed and your enter key unused, report him, and move the hell on.

pointing out just make you a target. you end up a target? you'll want to defend yourself and the entire time you'll look like an idiot but feel justified. THAT is when you'll say something equally toxic and be reported for it. you wont even realize you did it. and it could just be avoided instead.

and thats why Rito system sucks. And people like you never get it. So I have a feeder I can't even say yo dude can you relax and just play please? Stop feeding please (if they actually clearly are)? etc. ... but noooo. I gotta sit back and take it. Just like every other sh*t person in the game tossing around sexism, racism, clearly verbally abusive words around. Just sit back and suck it up or you get punished too. 

Meanwhile the real world. And every other game in the world. You can defend yourself. But not here. You get to log in and be a punching back for legit ignorant terrible people.

SquishySquish you even bring up that "you'll want to defend yourself". It is true many players do not want to be bullied around online but at face value, it is just another troll it should not be taken personally as you say.
